hero.title: Tapadinho
hero.subtitle: Nature and Pool · Countryside Villa in Portugal

about.title: About the Property
about.description: Casa do Tapadinho is an authentic rustic villa - close to the south bank of Douro River - isolated from the outside world, located in a peaceful and welcoming countryside area - just 1 hour driving from Porto airport - where the green color is the empress. It combines the charm and glamour of a traditional family house with the comfort of all the modern facilities that provides you with an unique and pleasant stay among the vineyards and terraces or by a great swimming pool.
about.areaDescription: Located in Castelo de Paiva, you'll find yourself surrounded by native forest, rolling hills, and traditional Portuguese villages. The region offers excellent local cuisine at nearby restaurants like O Compadre (6 km away), historic sites including Castelo de Santa Maria da Feira (34 km), and the beautiful Douro River (44 km) for boat trips. Porto's airport is just 60 km away, making it easily accessible for international guests.

review1.text: We went on a family holiday and took our two little dogs and we loved it! The area around the house (native forest) is magnificent, the space is super comfortable and cosy! We had everything we needed. We even had the chance to sip our hot coffee at one of the little tables by the lake. We'll definitely be back!
review1.author: Ana

review2.text: We liked the whole house, but our favourite part was the pool, where we had an amazing time as a family with our pets. The pool isn't very deep, it's the perfect height.
review2.author: Bebiana

review3.text: Maybe not for everyone but we experienced the house and surroundings as a little paradise. The house has character and the whole lot around it is beautiful. It is quiet and has lots of space. The pool is a real pool, and not an enlarged sort of bath tub. A beautiful view is included.
review3.author: Fennis

items.question: How many people can stay at the property?
items.answer: The property can accommodate up to 5 guests. We have 2 bedrooms (each with a double bed) and 1 sofa bed in the living room. The house is 150 m² with plenty of space for families or small groups.

items.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
items.answer: Check-in is from 3:00 PM to 10:00 PM - please inform us of your arrival time in advance. Check-out is by 11:00 AM. Upon arrival, you'll be welcomed, checked in, and provided with tips on local activities and dining recommendations.

items.question: Are pets allowed?
items.answer: Yes! We welcome well-behaved pets. Please let us know in advance if you're bringing a furry friend. Additional charges may apply. Our guests love bringing their dogs to enjoy the native forest and outdoor areas.

items.question: What amenities are included?
items.answer: The property includes: private swimming pool, fully equipped kitchen (dishwasher, microwave, oven, stove, coffee machine), private bathroom with bathtub and shower, washing machine, iron, fireplace, TV, free WiFi, heating, bed linen and towels, BBQ facilities, garden, and free private parking. The kitchen has all utensils and a refrigerator.

items.question: How do I get to the property?
items.answer: The property is located in Casal da Renda, Paraíso, Castelo de Paiva. Porto Airport (Francisco Sá Carneiro) is approximately 60 km away (1 hour drive). The property is easily accessible by car with free private parking on site. We'll provide detailed directions after booking.

items.question: Is the property suitable for children?
items.answer: Yes! All children are welcome. We can provide a free cot/crib for children aged 0-6 years (subject to availability). There is no age restriction for check-in. The pool isn't very deep - it's the perfect height for families.

items.question: What's nearby?
items.answer: Castelo de Paiva center is 4.1 km away. Nearby restaurants and cafés include O Compadre Restaurant (6 km), Café Central (6 km), and Confeitaria Tropicália (6 km). Tourist attractions include Castelo de Santa Maria da Feira (34 km), Europarque (37 km), and Rio Douro (44 km).

items.question: What languages does the host speak?
items.answer: Our host Mafalda speaks English, Spanish, French, and Portuguese. She's available throughout your stay to provide support and recommendations.
